price: Mũ ne mafi sani game da abin da suke faɗi, kuma bã zã ka zama mai tĩlasta su ba. Sabõda haka ka tunatar game da Alƙur'ani,* ga wanda ke tsõron ƙyacewaTa.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
footnotes: * Wannan ya nũna ba a wa'azi da ilmin da bã daga Alƙur'ãni aka fitar da shi ba, sai fa idan bai sãɓawa abin da ke cikin Alƙur'ani ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaqūlūna wamā anta ʿalayhim bijabbārin fadhakkir bil-qur'āni man yakhāfu waʿīdi
